Shemar Moore and Cicely Tyson costar(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: Casual Sex?
programme.desc: Lea Thompson and Victoria Jackson star in a first-rate sex comedy about two women looking for love at a health resort and confronting the changing sexual attitudes of society. Andrew Dice Clay also stars(n)

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas(n)

programme.title: The Best Offer
programme.desc: From the director of Cinema Paradiso comes this romantic thriller that stars Academy Award® winner Geoffrey Rush as an antique dealer who becomes increasingly obsessed with a reclusive young heiress who asks him to evaluate some family works of art(n)

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara(n)

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated(n)

programme.title: That Funny Feeling
programme.desc: Romantic blend of misunderstandings, mistaken identity and apartment-hopping. Sandra Dee, Bobby Darin, Donald O'Connor, Nita Talbot, James Westerfield. O'Shea: Leo G. Carroll. Luther: Larry Storch. Richard Thorpe directed

programme.title: The Restless Years
programme.desc: Story of a teenage couple who are troubled by parental disapproval and town gossip. John Saxon, Sandra Dee, Teresa Wright, James Whitmore, Luana Patten, Margaret Lindsay. Excellent screenplay by Edward Anhalt; based on an off-Broadway play. Helmut Kautner directed

programme.title: Romanoff and Juliet
programme.desc: America and the USSR woo the country of Concordia in this version of the Broadway hit. Peter Ustinov, Sandra Dee, John Gavin, Akim Tamiroff. Evdokia: Tamara Shayne. Written and directed by Ustinov

programme.title: Tammy Tell Me True
programme.desc: The bayou lass in college, with standard complications. Sandra Dee, John Gavin. Buford: Charles Drake. Suzanne: Julia Meade. Miss Jenks: Virginia Grey. Mrs. Call: Beulah Bondi. Judge: Edgar Buchanan. Joe: Cecil Kellaway. Pleasant enough. Harry Keller directed

programme.title: The Dunwich Horror
programme.desc: Terror permeates a coastal community in this H.P. Lovecraft tale of Black Masses and family skeletons. Sandra Dee, Dean Stockwell. Dr. Armitage: Ed Begley. Old Whateley: Sam Jaffe. Dr. Cory: Lloyd Bochner. Elizabeth: Donna Baccala. Cora: Talia Coppola (Shire)

programme.title: Brother John
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier as a mystical loner who returns to his Alabama home town at a time of racial ferment. Doc: Will Geer. Lloyd: Bradford Dillman. Louise: Beverly Todd. Orly: Ramon Bieri. Henry: Paul Winfield. George: Warren J. Kemmerling. Nettie: Zara Cully. Filmed at Marysville, Cal. Directed by James Goldstone

programme.title: A Warm December
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier directed and stars as an American doctor in London who falls for an African ambassador's niece (Esther Anderson). George Baker, Yvette Curtis. Ambassador Oswandu: Earl Cameron. Myomo: Johnny Sekka. (repeat)

programme.title: Goodbye, My Lady
programme.desc: A 14-year-old orphan living with his aging uncle in the Georgia swamps comes upon a stray dog, which he adopts

programme.title: Edge of the City
programme.desc: An army deserter gets a job on the New York City waterfront, where he befriends a black dockworker and butts heads with a corrupt, racist union boss. Martin Ritt's first directorial effort was written by Robert Alan Aurthur, who adapted his television play "A Man Is Ten Feet Tall." Sidney Poitier reprises his role from the TV drama

programme.title: Something of Value
programme.desc: Two close friends from childhood grow up and find themselves in conflict, on opposite sides of a bloody Mau Mau uprising in Kenya

programme.title: Buck and the Preacher
programme.desc: A con-man preacher joins forces with a wagon master during the post Civil War era to help freed slaves in the chaotic American Southwest

programme.title: A Patch of Blue
programme.desc: A poor, blind, white woman and a determined young black man forge a friendship, and he vows to help her leave her abusive home life. Shelley Winters won a Best Supporting Actress Oscar as the young woman's selfish, bigoted mother

programme.title: To Sir, With Love
programme.desc: An inexperienced and idealistic teacher invests himself in a group of problem kids at a high school in a slum of London's East End

programme.title: The Defiant Ones
programme.desc: Two prisoners, one black and one white, must work together as they make a desperate bid for freedom while being manacled to each other after they escape from a chain gang in the Deep South. An Oscar winner for the screenplay, and stars Sidney Poitier and Tony Curtis were both nominated for Best Actor

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Best Picture winner about a black police detective from Philadelphia who forces a bigoted Southern sheriff to accept his help with a homicide investigation after a wealthy Chicago businessman is murdered in a small Mississippi town. The film spawned two sequels and a TV-drama

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: An American destroyer tracks a Soviet submarine. Richard Widmark, Sidney Poitier. Ralston: James MacArthur. Schrepke: Eric Portman. Potter: Martin Balsam. Sonar Man: Wally Cox. Bascombe: Gary Cockrell. Allison: Michael Kane. Intriguing thriller, based on Mark Rascovich's novel. Directed by James B. Harris

programme.title: Cry the Beloved Country
programme.desc: Alan Paton's novel about black-white relations in South Africa. Canada Lee, Sidney Poitier, Charles Carson, Michael Goodliffe, Joyce Carey. Fine performances, and direction by Zoltan Korda

programme.title: The Tenderfoot
programme.desc: A cowboy is roped into investing in a Broadway production

programme.title: Flying Down to Rio
programme.desc: A Brazilian woman is wooed by an American bandleader, even though she is engaged to marry his best friend

programme.title: Chance at Heaven
programme.desc: An appealing cast helps this romance about a boy (Joel McCrea) who marries a socialite (Marion Nixon) but eventually returns to his first love (Ginger Rogers). Mrs. Franklyn: Virginia Hammond. Al: Andy Devine. Larrick: George Meeker. Harris: Lucien Littlefield. Mrs. Harris: Ann Shoemaker. Directed by William A. Seiter

programme.title: Twenty Million Sweethearts
programme.desc: Musical about a press agent who helps a young singer win fame. Dick Powell. Peggy: Ginger Rogers. Rush: Pat O'Brien. Pete: Allen Jenkins. Brockman: Joe Cawthorn. Sharpe: Grant Mitchell. Excellent cast. Ray Enright directed

programme.title: Star of Midnight

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jr. (George O. Gore II) is being teased by a new neighbor (Preston Wamsley), a boy who is much bigger than he is. But the bully is no match for Claire (Jazz Raycole). Maddy: Jacqueline Schultz. Jay: Tisha Campbell Martin. Michael: Damon Wayans. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: It seems as though Michael and Jay are speaking Chinese---they simply aren't paying attention to each other one Saturday. It all begins because she wants him to take part in family activities and he wants to watch basketball. So he tunes her out when she asks him to do something. Of course he doesn't know what it is. Michael: Damon Wayans. Jay: Tisha Campbell-Martin. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: While clothes shopping with Fancy and her parents (Marilyn McCoo and Billy Davis Jr.), Jamie's credit card is denied, leading Fancy's father to question whether Jamie has the means to care for his daughter properly. Meanwhile, Braxton makes cuts in the hotel's budget. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. Junior: Garrett Morris. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Fancy spies Jamie leaving a nightclub with an attractive, young female client whom he was ordered to take out on the town. When Fancy asks about the outing, Jamie describes the client as an old woman. Meanwhile, Braxton steals Fancy's idea for sprucing up the rooms at the hotel. Camille: Salli Richardson. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Bob: Blake Clark. Sheila: Sherri Shepherd. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Jamie takes the guys to the beach in Fancy's new BMW, which gets towed while they're playing volleyball with some bikini-clad beauties. programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show

programme.desc: Michael's single brother Ken (Keenen Ivory Wayans) shows up for dinner with his 21-year-old girlfriend, Tiara (Daphne Duplaix), sparking Michael's fears that his marriage (or at least his sex life) has lost its spark. Meanwhile, Claire's getting her hopes up (a bit too much) about an upcoming dance contest. Rosa: Marlene Forte. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael's accountant (radio personality Doug Banks) dies suddenly, prompting Michael to vow “to live life to its fullest.” His definition of “fullest” includes hugging Jay and the kids incessantly, wearing a wig, and deciding to sell his business and live in an RV. And he's driving his family crazy. Bruce: David Wells. Jay: Tisha Campbell-Martin. Jr.: George O. Gore II. Claire: Jazz Raycole. Kady: Parker McKenna Posey. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jr. and Claire are chafing at Michael's household rules, so he drops them all. He also stops doing anything for them. That means they must cook their own meals and get themselves to school. It also means no curfews for Jr., but locked doors when he returns home. And it means that Claire may talk on the telephone as long as she likes, as long as she uses the pay phone Michael has installed. Keisha: Natashia Williams. (repeat)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 16)
programme.desc: "Z pamiętnika lekarki" powraca! To kolejna odsłona przygód doktor Gretchen Haase, uwikłanej w miłosną relację z dwoma kolegami po fachu. W ośmiu nowych odcinkach lekarka znów będzie starała się trzymać emocje na wodzy oraz walczyć z pokusami ciała i ducha. Czas pokaże, czy spragniona uczuć kobieta znajdzie swoją bratnią duszę, a przy okazji zgubi kilka zbędnych kilogramów. Relacje Haase z mężczyznami przypominają rozgrywki sportowe, łącznie z wymianą koszulek. Tym razem przeciwników jest trzech. Przyjaciółka Gina stawia Haase tarota, by odkryć przed nią przyszłość

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 17)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Nie dane było Gretchen cieszyć się miesiącem miodowym w ramionach męża. Wszyscy obecni w kościele trafiają na kwarantannę z powodu epidemii. Kaan ma sprawować nadzór, lecz zadanie go przerasta

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 17)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Nie dane było Gretchen cieszyć się miesiącem miodowym w ramionach męża. Wszyscy obecni w kościele trafiają na kwarantannę z powodu epidemii. Kaan ma sprawować nadzór, lecz zadanie go przerasta

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 18)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Nie dane było Gretchen cieszyć się miesiącem miodowym w ramionach swojego męża. Wszyscy obecni w kościele muszą przejść kwarantannę z powodu epidemii. Kaan nie radzi sobie ze sprawowaniem nadzoru(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 19)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Kobieta i dwaj mężczyźni - to sytuacja dobrze znana Gretchen. W domu czeka na nią mąż, w szpitalu - dr Meier. Z każdym wiążą się inne rozterki. Gdyby Haase wiedziała, że poślubiła oszusta, to ułatwiłoby jej podjęcie decyzji. W dodatku pielęgniarka Sabine działa lekarce na nerwy(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 20)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Gretchen marzy o podróży w wehikule czasu, odkąd jej życie zmieniło się w koszmar. Pewna policjantka proponuje lekarce, by została przynętą w prowadzonym przez nią śledztwie, a Marc żałuje chwili słabości i wysyła jej SMS, który łamie jej serce. Haase obmyśla intrygę(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 16)
programme.desc: "Z pamiętnika lekarki" powraca! To kolejna odsłona przygód doktor Gretchen Haase, uwikłanej w miłosną relację z dwoma kolegami po fachu. W ośmiu nowych odcinkach lekarka znów będzie starała się trzymać emocje na wodzy oraz walczyć z pokusami ciała i ducha. Czas pokaże, czy spragniona uczuć kobieta znajdzie swoją bratnią duszę, a przy okazji zgubi kilka zbędnych kilogramów. Relacje Haase z mężczyznami przypominają rozgrywki sportowe, łącznie z wymianą koszulek. Tym razem przeciwników jest trzech. Przyjaciółka Gina stawia Haase tarota, by odkryć przed nią przyszłość

Nie dane było Gretchen cieszyć się miesiącem miodowym w ramionach swojego męża. Wszyscy obecni w kościele muszą przejść kwarantannę z powodu epidemii. Kaan nie radzi sobie ze sprawowaniem nadzoru(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 19)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Kobieta i dwaj mężczyźni - to sytuacja dobrze znana Gretchen. W domu czeka na nią mąż, w szpitalu - dr Meier. Z każdym wiążą się inne rozterki. Gdyby Haase wiedziała, że poślubiła oszusta, to ułatwiłoby jej podjęcie decyzji. W dodatku pielęgniarka Sabine działa lekarce na nerwy(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 20)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Gretchen marzy o podróży w wehikule czasu, odkąd jej życie zmieniło się w koszmar. Pewna policjantka proponuje lekarce, by została przynętą w prowadzonym przez nią śledztwie, a Marc żałuje chwili słabości i wysyła jej SMS, który łamie jej serce. Haase obmyśla intrygę(n)

programme.sub-title: Big Trouble in Little Norrisville/Winner Takes Ball.

programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer loses his guitar-pick necklace and cannot see Billy any more. Billy is so desperate for attention he inadvertently convinces Hugh and Jane the house is haunted. programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Howard suddenly becomes evil and Randy tries to get him back to normal. Then, Randy's reaction to a fan opens him up to attack

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Children's comedy about three socially awkward teens and their efforts to make sense of life, boys and fitting in

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Jas decides to follow in her dad's footsteps and try out for the junior hockey team. Mr Salford was a legendary hockey goalie in his time at the school. When the try-outs are cancelled due to the coach not being available, Mr Salford steps in and offers his services as coach. Mrs Griggs is horrified - she could do without the chaos he inevitably brings with him - but he won't take no for an answer. Jas and her father are really superstitious and when things start going wrong Jas thinks she's jinxed, and then that she's passed on the jinx to her dad. When she's not picked as goalie for the team Jas is actually relieved - it must mean she's still jinxed and hasn't passed on the jinx to her dad. Eventually Jas does need to play in goal, but when she saves a crucial penalty she and her dad are delighted to realise they are not jinxed after all, just accident-prone! Meanwhile, Martha & Ollie get paranoid that Cassie & Maxwell are usurping them. They've taken over their favourite nook in the library and when they turn up to do their regular security check on Mrs Rennison's computer Cassie and Maxwell have already been there and done it. They decide they've got to get their own back and they sabotage a fizzy drinks maker Cassie and Maxwell have created to provide refreshments at the hockey match. They turn up the CO2 dial and everyone gets very burpy! Lily is feeling abandoned by her friends - they all seem too busy to hang out with her. Matt advises her that a big gesture could do the trick. When she unfurls a giant banner during the hockey match declaring her admiration for her friends it's really embarrassing. It does prompt Martha and Ollie to do the right thing, though, and confess to Cassie and Maxwell that they sabotaged their fizzy drinks machine and does inspire Jas to save that crucial penalty

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Jas decides to follow in her dad's footsteps and try out for the junior hockey team. Mr Salford was a legendary hockey goalie in his time at the school. When the try-outs are cancelled due to the coach not being available, Mr Salford steps in and offers his services as coach. Mrs Griggs is horrified - she could do without the chaos he inevitably brings with him - but he won't take no for an answer. Jas and her father are really superstitious and when things start going wrong Jas thinks she's jinxed, and then that she's passed on the jinx to her dad. When she's not picked as goalie for the team Jas is actually relieved - it must mean she's still jinxed and hasn't passed on the jinx to her dad. Eventually Jas does need to play in goal, but when she saves a crucial penalty she and her dad are delighted to realise they are not jinxed after all, just accident-prone! Meanwhile, Martha & Ollie get paranoid that Cassie & Maxwell are usurping them. They've taken over their favourite nook in the library and when they turn up to do their regular security check on Mrs Rennison's computer Cassie and Maxwell have already been there and done it. They decide they've got to get their own back and they sabotage a fizzy drinks maker Cassie and Maxwell have created to provide refreshments at the hockey match. They turn up the CO2 dial and everyone gets very burpy! Lily is feeling abandoned by her friends - they all seem too busy to hang out with her. Matt advises her that a big gesture could do the trick. When she unfurls a giant banner during the hockey match declaring her admiration for her friends it's really embarrassing. It does prompt Martha and Ollie to do the right thing, though, and confess to Cassie and Maxwell that they sabotaged their fizzy drinks machine and does inspire Jas to save that crucial penalty

programme.desc: Visiting Dr Ranj at the Children's hospital today is Petal. Petal needs the cast on her arm changing because it has got dirty and is crumbling. Petal has a fractured arm. Dr Ranj shows her an x-ray of her fractured radius. She is going to have her plaster cast replaced with a fibre glass cast. Dr Ranj cuts off the plaster cast. Petal thinks her arm is thin and smelly but this is because she hasn't been able to wash it. Dr Ranj says Petal can choose the colour of her new cast. Petal picks her favourite colour, purple. Dr Ranj puts the new cast on Petal. She loves it and sings a song with Dr Ranj about taking care of your bones and wearing a cast. Petal then gets a special sticker for having being so good during her visit
